definition: water/river/liquid/beverage/additional charges or income/(of clothes) classifier for number of washes

sentences.english: It is often combined with elements of numerology .
sentences.chinese: 通常，风水还与占数学的原理结合起来使用。

sentences.english: It is the last day of qi yue and our geomancer says it is auspicious.
sentences.chinese: 那是七月的最后一天，风水师父说是个吉祥的日子。

sentences.chinese: 风水学宜忌篇中非凡强调反光为大凶，称反光煞。

sentences.english: One of the Four Auspicious Animals. It can stop the evil things and improve the environment.
sentences.chinese: 为吉祥四瑞兽之一，其功效能挡蔽诸煞，改善风水。

sentences.english: Today, the majority of its practitioners are Americans.
sentences.chinese: 现在，大部分的风水师是美国人。

sentences.english: How do you know if the feng shui in your home is good or not?
sentences.chinese: 怎么才知道你家的风水好不好？

sentences.english: Qianyan Temple is really a treasure place with the talent of the mountains and water.
sentences.chinese: 嵌岩寺，不愧是一处汲天地之灵气的风水宝地。

sentences.english: Geomantic culture is a part of Chinese traditional culture.
sentences.chinese: 风水文化是中国传统文化的一部分。

sentences.english: Declutter it. Feng shui masters say that adjusting the environs around a bed can bring couples closer.
sentences.chinese: 风水大师说调整床周围的环境可让夫妇更亲密。

sentences.english: First compass was invented and marriages.
sentences.chinese: 指南针首先是风水先生发明和使用的。

sentences.english: Fengshui is an important component of Chinese traditional culture.
sentences.chinese: 风水是中国传统文化的重要组成部分。

sentences.english: How do you know about that? P: Feng-Shui is becoming quite popular in the West.
sentences.chinese: 风水在西方越来越流行，这也算是文化互通吧。

sentences.english: Just on the other side of the lock are natural waterways that wind through freshwater marsh.
sentences.chinese: 只是对锁另一边是淡水沼泽，通过自然风水道。

sentences.english: Feng shui masters say that adjusting the environs around a bed can bring couples closer.
sentences.chinese: 风水大师说调整床周围的环境可让夫妇更亲密。

sentences.english: Feng Shui is permeated with a for people to "stay out of trouble, " the main line.
sentences.chinese: 风水学贯穿着一条为人们“趋吉避凶”的主线。
这里一定是块风水宝地。

definition: divination based on the eight characters of one's birth date
to alter one's fate/to improve one's luck (e.g. by changing one's name or phone number)
feng shui master/geomancer/stock figure in folk tales, as a wise adviser or a charlatan
the character 8 or 八/birthdate characters used in fortune-telling
to seek luck and avoid calamity (idiom)
The Yellow Emperor's Classic on the Feng Shui of Dwellings
to have one's fortune read/system of fortune telling based on a person's date and time of birth, according to 干支 (sexagenary cycle)
five phases of Chinese philosophy: wood 木, fire 火, earth 土, metal 金, water 水
